channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Italian prosecutor eyes possible manslaughter charges in Mike Lynch yacht sinking that killed 7
item.description: The public prosecutor of Termini Imerese has launched a probe into Mike Lynch's yacht shipwreck and multiple counts of culpable homicide, which is equ...

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Cava, Intuit, Ross Stores, Workday and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Campaign finance charges against girlfriend of FTX exec show political fallout from Bankman-Fried still ongoing
item.description: The Department of Justice charged the crypto lobbyist Michelle Bond of illegally financing her congressional campaign with FTX funds.

item.title: Northrop Grumman is among the most overbought stocks on Wall Street. Here are others
item.description: Some stocks have climbed so high, so fast that they are now regarded as "overbought."

item.title: Pakistan’s first Olympic winner in 32 years was rewarded with almost $1 million—and a buffalo
item.description: 27-year-old javelin thrower Arshad Nadeem was also given a Honda Civic.

item.title: Microsoft plans September cybersecurity event to discuss changes after CrowdStrike outage
item.description: Industry participants will discuss the idea of relying more on a safer part of Windows than the privileged kernel mode that CrowdStrike software uses.

item.title: Fed chair’s ‘unmistakably dovish’ tone gives investors hope for a mega rate cut next month
item.description: “The time has come for policy to adjust,” Powell said in his Jackson Hole speech on Friday.

item.title: Wyoming is pushing crypto payments and trying to beat the Fed to a digital dollar
item.description: As crypto investing becomes more institutionalized with bitcoin ETFs, Wyoming is already pushing into the next phase of growth for crypto: consumer pa...

item.title: When will the fall COVID-19 vaccines be available?
item.description: FDA approved the new vaccination Thursday.

item.title: Delta chief operations officer departing for another company after just over a year on the job
item.description: Delta's COO Mike Spanos, a company outsider, was hired in May 2023.
